                                 int max,
                                 int factory)
        Initializes a new instance of the BarcodeConfigurationValue class
        Parameters:
        commander - Used to command the connected reader
        address - Symbol PL4507 decoder parameter address
        min - Minimum value allowed
        max - Maximum value allowed
        factory - Factory default value
